name: @hyperlane-xyz/infra
description: A modified package.json to accommodate hardhat limitations

scripts.pre-hardhat: mv package.json package.json.bk && mv package.hardhat.json package.json
scripts.post-hardhat: mv package.json package.hardhat.json && mv package.json.bk package.json
scripts.kathy: yarn pre-hardhat ; yarn hardhat-esm run ./scripts/send-random-messages.ts ; yarn post-hardhat
scripts.test:hardhat: yarn pre-hardhat ; yarn hardhat-esm test test/govern.hardhat-test.ts ; yarn post-hardhat
